chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
y: pos n
x: pos n
Hxy: x <> y
q: nat
p: nat
i: nat
x': pos n
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
exists (j : nat) (w : Vector.t (list bool) n), (i, compare_stacks) // (i, v) ->> (j, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z /\ (v#>x = v#>y /\ j = p \/ v#>x <> v#>y /\ j = q))

Premises:
compare_stacks = POP x (4 + i) (7 + i) :: POP y q q :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: POP y i q :: PUSH y Zero :: POP y q i :: POP y q p :: PUSH x' Zero :: POP x' q q :: nil : list (bsm_instr n)
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
compare_stack_eq_spec : forall v : vec (list bool) n, v#>x = v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
compare_stack_neq_spec : forall v : vec (list bool) n, v#>x <> v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
cs_spec_rec : forall (l m : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>y = m -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z) /\ (l = m -> (i, compare_stacks) // (i, v) ->> (p, w)) /\ (l <> m -> (i, compare_stacks) // (i, v) ->> (q, w))
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
subcode_cons_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (J : X) (Q : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, J :: Q) -> i = j /\ I = J \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (S j, Q)
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_PUSH_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> {a : nat | a < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -[a] -> st}
bsm_compute_POP_E : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> P // (q, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_any : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
sss_loop_complete : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data), (forall x : data, x <> f x) -> forall C1 C2 : data -> Prop, (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, out_code p P -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) ->...-> p = q /\ (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n) /\ spec (iter f x n) y)
bsm_compute_POP_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P // (p, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
bsm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v0 w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos...
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w) = (v0, w) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
copy_stack = fun (x y z : pos n) (i : nat) => move_rev_stack x z i ++ copy_rev_stack z x y (7 + i) : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments copy_stack _ _ _ _%nat_scope
in_bsm_sss_pop_E : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)
subcode_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a r : list X), j = i -> (i, a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
length_copy_rev_stack : forall (x y z : pos n) (i : nat), length (copy_rev_stack x y z i) = 9
copy_stack_length : forall (x y z : pos n) (i : nat), length (copy_stack x y z i) = 16
sss_loop_sound : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data) (C1 C2 : data -> Prop), (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C2 x -> exists y : data, sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec x y) -> forall x : data, pre x -> (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n)) -> exists (n : nat) (y : data), sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec (iter f x n) y
subcode_snoc_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
subcode_app_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l r : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
bsm_compute_PUSH : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
Fin.FS_inj : forall x0 y0 : pos ?n, pos_nxt x0 = pos_nxt y0 -> x0 = y0 where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v0) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
Inductive bsm_sss (n : nat) : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n ->...-> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x]) | in_bsm_sss_push : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) Arguments bsm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_E [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_push [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
Fin.eq_dec : forall x0 y0 : pos ?n, {x0 = y0} + {x0 <> y0} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
BinInt.Z.max_spec : forall n m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt n m /\ BinInt.Z.max n m = m \/ BinInt.Z.le m n /\ BinInt.Z.max n m = n
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
in_vec_dec_inv : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n), (forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall x : X, in_vec x v -> {p : pos n | v#>p = x}
empty_stack_spec : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), (i, empty_stack x i) // (i, v) -> > (3 + i, v[nil/x])
in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n v : vec (list bool) n |- Type]

``` 
assert (Hxy' : x' <> x) by congruence.
assert (Hxy'' : x' <> y) by congruence.
destruct (compare_stack_eq_spec v Hxy) as [w_eq [H_eq_1 H_eq_2]].
destruct (compare_stack_neq_spec v Hxy) as [w_neq [H_neq_1 H_neq_2]].
destruct (cs_spec_rec _ _ _ _ _ _ H_eq_1 H_eq_2) as [w_eq' [H_eq'1 [H_eq'2 H_eq'3]]].
destruct (cs_spec_rec _ _ _ _ _ _ H_neq_1 H_neq_2) as [w_neq' [H_neq'1 [H_neq'2 H_neq'3]]].
exists p, w_eq.
split.
+ exact H_eq'2.
+ intros z H_z_x H_z_y.
  assert (H_z_neq: z <> x) by auto. 
  assert (H_z_neq': z <> y) by auto.
  specialize (H_eq'3 z H_z_neq H_z_neq').
  rewrite H_eq'3.
  split.
  * destruct (Fin.eq_dec z x) as [Hzx | Hzx].
    ++ subst. apply H_eq'1.
    ++ destruct (Fin.eq_dec z y) as [Hzy | Hzy].
       -- subst. apply H_eq'1.
       -- apply H_eq'2. apply Hzy.
  * right. split.
    ++ intros H_absurd. apply Hxy. rewrite H_absurd. reflexivity.
    ++ exact H_eq'3.
```

original: assert (Hxy' : x' <> x) by congruence. assert (Hxy'' : x' <> y) by congruence. destruct (compare_stack_eq_spec v Hxy) as [w_eq [H_eq_1 H_eq_2]]. destruct (compare_stack_neq_spec v Hxy) as [w_neq [H_neq_1 H_neq_2]]. destruct (cs_spec_rec _ _ _ _ _ _ H_eq_1 H_eq_2) as [w_eq' [H_eq'1 [H_eq'2 H_eq'3]]]. destruct (cs_spec_rec _ _ _ _ _ _ H_neq_1 H_neq_2) as [w_neq' [H_neq'1 [H_neq'2 H_neq'3]]]. exists p, w_eq. split. + apply H_eq'2. + intros z H_z_x H_z_y. assert (H_z_neq: z <> x) by auto. assert (H_z_neq': z <> y) by auto. specialize (H_eq'3 z H_z_neq H_z_neq'). rewrite H_eq'3. split. * destruct (Fin.eq_dec z x) as [Hzx | Hzx]. ++ subst. apply H_eq'1. ++ destruct (Fin.eq_dec z y) as [Hzy | Hzy]. -- subst. apply H_eq'1. -- apply H_eq'2. apply Hzy. * right. split. ++ intros H_absurd. apply Hxy. rewrite H_absurd. reflexivity. ++ apply H_eq'3.
